subject: p13023326
History: -year-old man with shortness of breath and pleural effusion after drainage.
Impression: PA and lateral chest compared to : Small right pleural effusion, minimally larger than on. No pneumothorax. Lungs essentially clear. Marked enlargement and distortion of the cardiac silhouette by adjacent tumor is a longstanding phenomenon. There is no evidence of any hemodynamically significant pericardial involvement.
